properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating Germany’s first/inaugural airmail flight on February 18, 1912, in West Berlin, Germany, by Hans Grade with monoplane; cancellation stamp dated February 18, 1984 in Berlin; includes information on reverse.
